name: Brandish Mechanoid Hercules Base
desc: Activate only if you control no monsters in your Main Monster Zones. The equipped monster can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase, but it cannot attack directly. If the equipped monster destroys a monster by its attack while you have 3 or more Spells in your GY: Draw 1 card. If this card is sent from the field to the GY by a card effect: You can target up to 3 "Brandish" cards in your GY, except "Brandish Mechanoid Hercules Base"; shuffle them into the Deck.
